es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.nn.sim

Interface Similarity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ItemSimilarity, SetCosineItemSimilarity, SetCosineSimilarity, SetCosineUserSimilarity, SetJaccardItemSimilarity, SetJaccardSimilarity, SetJaccardUserSimilarity, SetSimilarity, UserSimilarity, VectorCosineItemSimilarity, VectorCosineSimilarity, VectorCosineUserSimilarity, VectorJaccardItemSimilarity, VectorJaccardSimilarity, VectorJaccardUserSimilarity, VectorSimilarity

    public interface Similarity
    Generic similarity for fast data. This is the interface that is under the hood of the user and item similarities. It is does not need be symmetric.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Stream<IdxDouble> similarElems(int idx)
      Returns all the users/items having a similarity greater than 0, together with the value of the similarity.
      IntToDoubleFunction similarity(int idx)
      Returns a function that returns the similarity with the user/item.
      default double similarity(int idx1, int idx2)
      Returns the similarity between two users/items.

    • Method Detail

        Returns a function that returns the similarity with the user/item.

        Returns:
        function that returns the similarity with the index

      • similarity

        default double similarity(int idx1,

      • similarElems

        Stream<IdxDouble> similarElems(int idx)
        Returns all the users/items having a similarity greater than 0, together with the value of the similarity.
        Parameters:
        idx - index of user/item
        Returns:
        stream of index-similarity pairs
